description: ****** Notice ****** (1) *** It might be respond nothing the first time you pressed it, please try again or wait for a moment. Or if it really does nothing, reboot the device manually please. *** (2) This app contains a widget so you can add it on home screen if you need. (3) It works on * ROOTED * phones only。 Please don't try to download or install this app if you don't know what "root" is. (4) Don't move this app to SD card or any other external storage. It may be cause the app disabled or vanish. (5) I couldn't promise you that this app will work well on any device because of the fragmentation of Android. For example on some Samsung devices, "Reboot Bootloader" just does a normal reboot. (6) The function 'hot reboot' need BusyBox support, so the option will be hidded if BusyBox isn't installed. (7) *** The launcher icon' showing option will take effect after a few seconds on your launcher. Please hold on for a monent. If you want the launcher icon again, just add widget and change the setting option *** Reboot Manager includes the following features: * normal reboot * hot reboot * reboot to recovery * reboot to bootloader * power off *** Thanks for Олег Глядков's Russian support helping. ***
release_text: v1.4 add material design for android 5.0 add confirmation dialog checkbox in setting page v1.3.6 Sovled the error message problem but execute successfully when updating the android system os to 4.4 KitKat

description: Animal match is a fun game for toddlers ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Try to match the different animals over 50 different animals and hours of fun for your toddler ★ Easy men fort toddlers ★ cute animals ★ easy to use for children Let your kids enjoy this great puzzle game surrounded by over 50 animals. And this game is not just pure fun; it is much more than this. ★ Hours and hours of constant fun for your kid ★ Awesome graphics that your kid will adore ★ Animals from all around the world, your kid will feel like he/she is in the zoo ★ It’s not just fun, your kid will develop his/her knowledge while playing this game ★ It’s like a puzzle meeting crosswords but 21st century style ★ It is interactive, you kid will have to use both his/her brain and hands to “win” the game This game is created so your toddler could enjoy. This game won’t stress out your kid. Furthermore, it’s not too challenging but it can definitely help your kid develop little grey cells and hand motorics. This is not a super-advanced game, this is the basic knowledge for your toddlers and your child needs to learn the basics before he/she can continue with the more complicated games. What is great about this fun game is the fact that it comes free of charge. So, here you go, no need to think about it twice, press the download button and let your kid start learning the animal kingdom. Have fun
release_text: Some devices have had problems with unlocking the game this is now fixes have fun!

description: Hello Kids, Love to play Circus Games? Then try our amazing “Fun at the circus”! Circus is in your hand now! A must have fun game for all kids. This circus game includes four different game types (puzzle, jigsaw puzzle, stickers and dress the clown). Each game is perfectly designed for kids to have fun. Each game is designed to make your kids happy :) Kids, Explore your geniuses! Solve the circus puzzle, Make your circus sticker as you want, Dress up the circus clown as much as attractively you can to catch viewers eye and show them to others, Use your brain to solve Jigsaw Puzzle. Don’t be afraid about Puzzle or Jigsaw Puzzle! Because it is not that hard you think. It is challenging but easy for you because you are genius so you can solve all of them! **** The puzzle game includes 6 different full size puzzle piece games. You think Kids Puzzle Game is so easy? How fast you can solve them? Compete with your friends **** The sticker’s game includes a lot of different stickers to play with **** Dress the clown includes a lot of different things to dress the clown with. Customize as you love to see the clowns. **** Jigsaw puzzle game includes a lot of different jigsaw puzzles, Use your imagination to solve each Puzzle. And a lot of clowns and animals are waiting for you to play with you! What goes in the package? • Wonderful looking high quality graphics • Stunning and attractive colors in every puzzle • Each puzzle has a different set of objects, animals and clowns • Cool background sound tracks • Hours of fun and education Parents are too concerned about their kids now days. Don’t worry; our game is both educational and entertaining. Kids Puzzle and Jigsaw puzzle will sharpen your kids brain, Sticker and Circus Clown Dress up will enlarge kids imagination power. Our game will give your kids power of big imagination on Small hands. No matter where you are, your kid will be able to keep his/her mind occupied. This is a kids games that you won’t forbid your kid to play. It is both easy and challenging but also educational and entertaining. How is that possible? Well, each slide has a totally different set of animals and objects but the principle behind the game is the same in every slide. Pleasing design will keep your kids imagination occupied for the weeks to come. The game is not poor with colors which is what your kids really love-loads of colors to catch every toddler’s attention. Don’t wait to DOWNLOAD now FREE preview of Kids Brain Puzzles game! If you love this circus Puzzle game then you may unlock full game and enjoy the pure satisfaction of this game. If you have any suggestion about this game then please let us know. We will highly appreciate that. If you like this game, Weedoo has a lot more kids games, check them out! Please visit www.weedoo.se for more kids games Have fun! Good Luck!

My house is fun stickers game for kids the house have 9 different rooms that can be furnished in unlimited ways * 200 different items to play with * 9 different rooms * 14 different human characters * Hours of fun Have fun!!

Fun for Toddlers is back! The Fun for Toddlers 2, is an educational and entertaining game. This is the sequel to the popular puzzle Fun for Toddlers, it has fun sounds and unique puzzle games your kids will love. If your child loves to explore the outer space, oceans and other exciting place, this game is for you! Now with more colorful and intriguing characters, funny and delightful sounds, Fun for Toddlers 2 will surely tickle your little tots with such excitement while learning all the while. In Fun for Toddlers 2, your kids will enjoy solving puzzles in cool places such as in police stations, underwater, circus, outer space, and more! There are plenty of different puzzles to keep your child busy and engaged while learning. As the new Fun for Toddlers 2 is simple and intuitive, your little one will have lots of fun for hours! And the best part, this educational game will help your toddler improve in problem solving, logical and cognitive skills. DEVICE Available in all screen resolutions and devices, smartphones and tablets! FEATURES * High quality puzzle game for toddlers and preschool kids * Toddlers develop their fine motor skills by dragging and dropping puzzle pieces * Every puzzle has seven puzzle items that make funny sounds (84 different sounds) * Fun and toddler friendly puzzles * Easy to use and control * Great and cute animal and object sounds * UI for toddlers * Design for toddlers * Is available in multiple languages, including English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, Swedish * This game is suitable for all kids, boys and girls, ages 2 to 5 year olds Have fun! This game is brought to you by Weedoo, a creative gaming company based in Stockholm, Sweden. Our goal is to create games for toddlers that are both entertaining and develop learning skills for kids. Our game apps are designed especially for toddlers and preschoolers, with brightly-colored effects that will keep them delighted. Please visit www.weedoo.se for more kids’ games.
release_text: Small fixes. * Please leave us a review or rating. Thank you! *

description: Puzzle is fun! This is an easy and fun puzzle for toddlers *Easy and fun puzzles *Easy menu for toddlers *Great images Puzzle - Fun For Kids Your child will love playing with Puzzle - Fun for Kids. Out of the many kids’ games out there, this one is sure to be a favorite of your toddlers. Puzzles have always been popular with kids. With the Puzzle app, puzzle play has been upgraded and made even more entertaining. You and your child don’t have to worry about losing pieces and you can easily keep your toddlers entertained on the go. It’s easy to play in the car, out shopping, at home, etc. The images are great and toddler appropriate. There are several image backgrounds to choose from, each with their own individual animals and objects. Your kid can help put bugs, farm animals, sea creatures, dinosaurs, princesses and more where they belong on each colorful image. It’s as easy as dragging each to the right spot and dropping them to fit perfectly. Don’t worry about the difficulty level, because this kids’ game app is toddler friendly. It is easy to use, easy to navigate so that your kid can have fun without constant interruption because of confusing controls and menus. The game helps your toddler even celebrate the finished puzzle, thanks to special effects, so that they know that they have done a good job and can move onto another puzzle to continue the fun. Puzzle includes: - At least a dozen images to choose from - Fun images of different worlds - Great sound effects - Fun special effects - Easy and simple navigation - Hours of entertainment! Be sure to check out other Kids Games available for your toddler and other kids. Let them have some fun and learn along the way. Kids Games has other app games such as Puzzle for Toddlers, Fun for Toddlers, Learn to Read and many more. We strive to keep toddler entertainment and learning games free for your child’s benefit. If you have any feedback or suggestions, feel freed to contact us. We are always looking for new and better ways to keep your kids entertained and more creative ways of learning new things. Have fun playing this puzzle game! don forget to check out our other puzzle and toddlers games !

Please visit www.weedoo.se for more kids games have fun!

Robot match Is a simple and fun game for young children 4 different game types and 63 different robots Have fun! This is an awesome puzzle game for your toddlers that will take them to the magical world of well-designed robots. Designers took some time to create all the great looking robots so your kid can have loads of fun over the couple of weeks. This is what your kid will get for free if you decide to download this awesome kid’s game: • 4 different type of games • 63 different robots! • Awesome graphics • Great colors • User friendly interface • Good for all ages This beautiful, colorful children game will take your kid right to the world of robots. Once there, your kid will enjoy the graphics, design and will spend hours of quality time. This game is created for both education and fun. Besides this, the game can be played with or without parents. If your kid is just starting to play video games, you will enjoy helping him/her to match the robots.

Toddler is fun pointing book for the youngest children. click and play each animal makes a different sound Have Fun! Toddler is a colorful, fun kid’s games app. Keep your kids entertained with many pictures of animals and objects that make their own unique sounds. There are dozens of animals to choose from to help your toddler learn and have fun. It’s like a picture book come to life! You children will be delighted to explore each page -- a new and different world -- like including: - Jungle - Farm - Desert - Space - Artic Each new world comes with at least 5 objects or animals for your toddlers to point to. Hear a cow moo, a spider scurry, an elephant trumpet, a monkey’s silly sounds and much more. Your children can have lots of fun interacting with each page and everything in it with a simple click. Includes: - Several pages to keep your kids from growing board - Each page offers unique design and color - Nice background, cute and loveable characters - Interactive features to entertain the children - Sounds for each page - High Quality graphics - Works on phones and tablets - Plenty of entertainment for the kids for hours Entertainment for your kids and a bit of education has never been easier to accomplish. With this game on your mobile device, you don’t have to worry about toting around paper picture books and bulky games wherever you go. Just bring up the game and hand it to your child for lots of fun. Toddler is easy to navigate, even for the youngest of toddlers. The controls are simple, easy to use and your child will be well on their way to learning new animal sounds and enjoying the different picture worlds. Other Fun Children’s Games offered by us: Learn to Read (Learn ABC), Fun for Toddlers, Puzzle for Toddlers, Puzzle fun for Kids 1 and 2, Animal Match Fun for Toddler, Jungle Puzzle - fun for kids, MatchIt and more. Please let us know what you think of this game. Any feedback or tips for improvement are greatly appreciated as we want to make our games as fun and helpful to your children as possible.

RunRadar is an app specialized in the real-time search of local running and marathon events, such as march, run, walk, marathon, semi marathon, half marathon, trail, skyrun, etc. You can search for the running and marathon events that are geographically close to you or meet your training goals. You can search within range of dates or refine your search by providing RunRadar with the name of the event or distance range, depending on your training level. According to your search criteria, Runradar autonomously searches the Web in real time to identify the events that match your requirements. For each event, RunRadar will also provide you the links to the running sites where you can find a detailed description of the event. You can save your favorite running and marathon events, share them on Facebook, Twitter and your personal calendar. Events are searched for in real time directly from your device. The most important national and regional sites are analyzed, with an excellent coverage of all local events. With this version of RunRadar, you can search for events in United States, Canada, France and Italy. More countries are coming soon. You can send your suggestions and requests to: appsc3po@gmail.com .

Party Punchout offers a new and innovative idea in mobile gameplay. This groundbreaking game combines 3 concepts not previously seen together in a single mobile app: 1. It’s an addictively fun point-and-shoot racing game. 2. It aims (pun intended!) to increase political engagement and awareness. 3. It’s a free, and easy, fundraising & name recognition resource for political campaigns at every level, from local Congressional districts all the way up to the Presidential level. As a player, go head to head with your political opponents in this easy-to-play, but challenging-to-win game!! Be Arnold Schwarzenegger, Nancy Pelosi, Ronald Reagan, or any of several other political leaders, and vanquish your opponents by racing against them and shooting down their bubbles of ideology. As either a Republican or a Democrat, you must shoot down enough of the opposing party’s bubbles to unlock successive levels as you race to reach political office from Governor, to House of Representatives, to the Senate, — all the way up to the White House! Political candidates at all levels (from local Congressional districts up to the Presidential level) register and list their information with the app. Players can see exactly who the current Candidates are in their own district and state, and can even view Candidates’ websites, where supporters can find out more about issues, and can donate directly to the campaign. Come for the fun, and to defend your ideas... end up by finding out exactly who is defending your ideas in Washington! A fantastic grass-roots fundraising and name-recognition resource for political candidates at every level. Features: • Simple controls— aim and shoot down bubbles of the opposite political party!! • 4 increasingly challenging levels of play: Governor, House of Representatives, Senator, and President.! • Use power-ups to increase your speed or more easily shoot bubbles! • Leaderboard shows how you match up against both Republican and Democratic players in your state!!

Very simple small size stop watch with timer function. * Stop watch * Timer * Minimalistic design * Unlimited lap times * Multiple named stop watch sessions * Named timer presets * 1/1, 1/10 or 1/100 seconds * Fastest and slowest laps * Average lap time * Add/subtract time to timer without reset * Runs in background * Status bar notifications * Automatic brightness (Does not affect general brightness settingson your device) * Supports portrait and landscape mode * Share function (Android 4.0 and higher) Uses: * android.permission.VIBRATE: Required for vibration * android.permission.WAKE_LOCK: Required for the alarm to be triggered when the device is in sleep mode * android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Required for saving the data on disk

SBS Next Bus is one of the developer's app that gotten the green light from SBS Transit to use their OpenAPI to access their bus arrival timing. No need to worry about unable to get your bus timing in your Android phone! An dedicated Android app for users in Singapore, you can find out when your next SBSTransit bus is coming! Just key in the bus number and bus stop number and you will be able to find out the bus arrival timing. You can use this app to check bus departure from interchange, and there is an built in journey planner too! http://theandroidguide.com/2011/06/08/sbs-next-bus-to-implement-sbstransit-openapi/ We will be adding more features and updates progressively so please stay tuned! 자동차박사는 국내 자동차(현대, 기아, 르노삼성, 쉐보레, GM대우, 쌍용) 정보를 한눈에 볼수 있는 앱입니다. 1. 메인화면 1-1. 제조사, 차종 정보 선택합니다. 차량정보, 자가정비, DIY, 순정부품, 튜닝부품, 타이어, 차량 점검 주기, 자동차보험, 즐겨찾기 카테고리가 있습니다. 1-2. 인터넷 아이콘을 클릭하면, 해당 제조사 모바일 웹사이트로 이동합니다. 2. 차량정보 : 세부 차량 정보를 확인 할 수 있습니다. 세부 항목 하나를 선택 하면, 선택 차량의 포토, 제원, 리뷰, 가격 정보를 확인 할 수 있습니다. 3. 자가정비 : 스스로 체크 할 수 있는 정비 항목이 나오며, 목록 중 하나를 선택하면, 웹 검색을 통하여 원하는 정보를 검색 할 수 있습니다. 다음[정확도순/최신글순] 및 네이버[유사도순/날짜순]를 검색을 지원하며, 유용한 정보는 즐겨 찾기 항목으로 저장 할 수 있습니다. 4. DIY, 순정 부품, 튜닝부품, 타이어, 차량 점검주기 카테고리는 각각의 세부 항목을 가지고 있으며, 자가정비와 기능 은 동일 합니다. 5. 자동차 보험 : 자동차 보험 회사 목록을 보여 줍니다. 리스트를 롱터치를 통해 나의 보험 회사 등록 및 사고접수/보험문의 전화 하기가 가능합니다. 타이틀바 상단 오른쪽의 전화 아이콘을 통해 긴급출동/사고접수 전화로 바로 연결 됩니다. 이 앱을 자주 이용하여, 기본적인 차량관리 및 지식을 쌓는데 많은 도움이 됐으면 하는 바람입니다. Transform your photo to vector graphic(SVG or DXF)! This app is a port and front end of potrace on Android! To use this app, firstly please select a photo on your phone or take a photo. Next you can crop the photo, select the region you want to trace. Next please specify a threshold value for black/white image, potrace will process the output black/white image. Now you will see a preview of output vector graphic. Last step, save it to file, we support svg and dxf formats. This is an open source project, more information please see: https://github.com/jiangpeng79/antrace Thanks

description: "Conversation master PRO version!! This is a useful language learning app with various situational QnA styled expressions for daily conversation. You can learn many expressions to speak in real situations. Now you have a huge confidence to talk with foreigners in restaurant, street and a trip abroad. This contains 30,000+ expressions for daily situations with native voice data. Today’s Talk notification shows you each expression per a day for you to learn and listen to those expressions one by one. You can enjoy learning languages with native speaker’s voice like to talk with real native speakers. 1. Image training is a good way to learn a language!! Conversation Master helps you to train yourself with indirect experiences for many situations in your daily life. This increases efficiency of your learning with helping to imagine you were in the situations. It is important to do image training repeatedly about daily conversation with the situations in business, restaurant, and hotel etc. 2. Interpretation function Interpretation available immediately through voice recognition 3. Listening and repeated learning is also good for learning a language!! Conversation Master makes you learn as you see and listen to the expressions. It is important to listen to the expressions repeatedly with ‘Repeat all’ and ‘Listen all’ features while your free time. For example when you go to and off from your work/school or a few minutes before you sleep and so on. 4. Have challenge to a new language life!! Conversation Master is launched with 10 languages of Korean, English, Japanese, Chinese, French, German, Spanish, Thai, Indonesian, and Vietnamese. So you may learn and experience various language expressions. Have a challenge to a new language life of various languages without hesitation. # Conversation Master is produced by a professional language contents provider TIMESPACESYSTEM. This app is based on TIMESPACESYSTEM‘s best seller products with handpicked expressions and native voice data. Main Features *Native speaker’s Voice data *30,000+ expressions in 12 Categories *Replaceable words in expressions *Interpretation function *Save recent translation function *Today's talk notification *QnA styled contents *Listen all, Repeat all *Send contents by email and SMS *Voice Search ※ Notice ※ This app provides its limited contents only in the free version and supports the In App Purchase (IAP) of the App Store. If you want to use the all contents of it, you have to purchase the full version."

Configurable daycare checklist that helps you select the right daycare for your kid. Comes pre-populated with more than 170 items that you need to check before selecting a facility. Check/uncheck and reuse everytime you go to select care facility for your kid. Save all the time typing the list. Easy and very intuitive thumb friendly check/uncheck options. PLEASE NOTE: All the features listed in the description are INCLUDED with the purchase. The in-app purchase option is used only if you want to purchase additional templates (in addition to day care list). The app does NOT need internet connection. Your privacy is guaranteed. We back our app with 100% refund ANYTIME beyond the refund window. If you are not satisfied for any reason, just send us an email. New Features! - Tablet support. Quick navigation - just swipe right to reveal the left pane. "Quick add" features. You can add notes, quantity and an additional measurement. Auto sort ability. Checkout more features below. Features include: - Tablet support. - Quick navigation. For small screen devices, just swipe right to reveal the left pane. - Create new lists from factory templates in minutes. - Add/Edit or delete lists/items/categories. - Quickly add item or category from the same screen with the "Quick Add" feature. - Add Notes, Quantity and an additional measurement (weight/volume/temperature etc) for each item. - Hide/Unhide checked items, move checked to bottom/top. - Ability to delete all checked items. - "Add After This" or "Add Before This" option to insert items wherever you want and quickly. - Password protect from prying eyes. - Option to check all/uncheck all so you can reuse the list again. - Copy or Move between lists, categories and items. Quickly creates your own personal list in matter of minutes. - Auto Sort either in ascending or descending order. - Rearrange items/categories/lists using drag/drop. - Indicates the total number of items and the number of items that need to be completed. - Color coded (green, yellow and red) for a visually appealing presentation - Export/Backup all lists to external storage and import them back when needed. - Edit your list on your computer and import it back. - Easily email with your friends / family using any sharing client you have on your device. - Send and share via Bluetooth to any bluetooth enabled device - Easily send to your printer (via email - Needs email to print support on your printer)

description: A 3D game where you skate around a skateboard park on a snowboard. Jump around a variety of parks as you do dynamic air and rail tricks. Features - SCORE ATTACK MODE: link tricks and aim for a high score - FREE RIDE MODE: no rules, no time limits - Tweak your parameters with a wide range of gear and items (speed, height, rotations) Unleash tricks Grabs: indy, melancholy, tail, nose, method, etc. Rail: normal, tailpress, nosepress, etc. Spin: flat, flip, 3D Skating Scores The app assigns detailed scores to your tricks based on how cool they are. It evaluates your height in the air, speed, number of spins, and number of combinations as the basic criteria, and then takes into account your landing skills, use of the park, and level of difficult of the tricks. Note: Game may not function as intended on some devices. Does not support data synching or restoring. Stay tuned: We plan to keep adding parks, items, and tricks after release.

Take a coffee break and enjoy this very cool theme: GO LOCKER CUTE! DOWNLOAD GO Locker Cute NOW and make the day better! This is a GO Locker theme. If you don't have GO Locker installed, you will see a pop-up menu asking you to install GO Locker. How to set: - After your download finishes, all you need to do is "open" the locker, "set as active", head to the "installed" section (upper right corner), apply the desired one and you're done! Now the real magic begins: - The locker allows you to access four functions with the fourkey. These functions can also be changed from the settings menu and don't forget the interactive circle will show you if the phone needs charging! - For your comfort, the menus for this locker come in 48 different language translations! Don't forget to RATE and COMMENT! Also, do not hesitate to contact us for any suggestions or questions you might come across, at tmestudio1@gmail.com This locker uses a free font which can be found at www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/pacifico and http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Caviar-Dreams To support further development of high quality lockers, this app may show some ads that do not interfere with the app's functionality.

Avatar fight is an ingenious multiplayer online game nothing like the other MMORPG games in the app store. The game is simple yet challenging, fun and addictive. It will give you a different taste of online games. ★ DESIGN FOR THE FUN OF PLAYING WITH HUMAN PLAYERS The core of the game play is PvP fight and guild wars. You can't be a top player without support of friends, without being a part of a powerful guild. Making lots of friends and cherishing your reputation, building a great guild and making your fame! NOTE: not all players are your friends, they could be your ruler who taxing on you, they could be the spy in your guild. ★ GORGEOUS GAME PLAY To grow your avatar in the game, you have to actively fight players, enroll contests, and do tasks to gain experiences and level up. You need to raise pets, collect weapons, and armor your avatar to face the fightings. ★ Features: - Fighting other players in the arena. - Claiming titles in the combat contests. - Cool characters: Knight, ninja, pirate, vampire, etc. - Cool pets: werewolf, dragon, dinosaur, etc. - Cool weapons and armors to acquire. - Cool skills: call friends to join a fight, turn your enemy's pet into sheep, etc. - Friends list, message wall and group discussion. - Guild war: exciting multi-rounds group fightings. - Guild league: guild team vs guild team, each team has 5 members. - Single player league: a good place to demo your power. - Single player can loot a guild for money, experience and other item. - Building mines, producing materials and gems. - Hero tower: compete for the top positions in the hero tower. - Auction house. ** Thank you all for the feedbacks. We are listening! **

Swap and slide lovely candies on the board, arrange candies into matching groups of three or more to collect. Chain rection could happen when empty spaces are filled in. The longer the chain, the higher the score you can get in one shot.

Free Kick Master is the most addictive football game ever. Simply swipe the soccer ball to kick. It is simple to play but hard to master. Can you curve the ball around the wall and goal? It is very entertaining and challenging, you will be totally addicted to the game. You can edit levels and share them with other players.

Enjoy the gift match game in the Christmas season! Swap and slide lovely gifts on the board, arrange gifts into matching groups of three or more to collect. Chain rection could happen when empty spaces are filled in. The longer the chain, the higher the score you can get in one shot.

Antarctic Adventure is a racing game with lots of funs. You takes role of a little penguin, visit the Antarctic research stations of different countries. Runing fast while avoiding seals and breaks in ice, complete the journey before the time running out. Marathon mode is also included. Let the advanture begin!
This is a solitaire gamebox contains three classic games: Spider, Klondike and FreeCell. ★ Tablet supported ★

★ Tablet supported ★ Sudoku Master is the ULTIMATE sudoku game for beginner, intermediate and expert. Both the game quality and the game play experience is the BEST. The resolver can show the solution logic step by step. Support: Locked Candidate Naked/Hidden subset X-Wing,SwordFish Skyscraper,Kite,EmptyRectangle Finned Fish,Wings,Chains ...

A simple application that calculates how much money you can earn based on the national average of price/pound of aluminum scrap metal cans to be recycled. This app is to give you a estimate of how much money you can make. If you recycle your cans and receive a different amount of money than what the application presented, please email us what state you live in, the amount received, and how many pounds. We will use this information to help make the application more accurate. **NOTE: You may or may not receive the amount stated in the application. Please check with your local metal recycling center for exact prices. Please email us with any other features you would like to see.
release_text: *Background Change *Added Buttons to determine User input preference *State Selection is now in List form *Permanent Display of Earnings, state, and price/lb.

description: Air Hockey is now available FREE! (as an experiment, possibly only for a limited time!) Classic arcade fun comes to your phone! - Easy touchscreen control - A computer opponent that gets tougher as you get better - Smooth graphics - Realistic sounds - Two-player mode on supported phones (including Nexus S / Galaxy S / Droid / Droid 2 / Droid Incredible / Evo 4G) See JJCgames.com for a YouTube video. Privacy policy: Air Hockey FREE uses advertising services that use cookies, web beacons, and other technologies to collect information when you view or tap on ads in the game. A version of the game without advertising is available to buy (listed under Similar apps below).
release_text: Ads have been removed from all of the screens except for the ones at the end of a match, but the ads on those screens were made more prominent, with a short (3 second) waiting time before you can start another game. I hope that isn't too annoying. Feedback is welcome!

description: JJPlay Landlord (Dou Di Zhu, 斗地主), the best FREE Landlord experience available on smartphones and tablets. Get ready to out wit your opponents in this Chinese classic. ONLINE MULTIPLAYER Automatic matchmaking – So you always find fun and challenging opponents. Or play with friends – Just log in with Facebook to connect with each other. Or play offline with the computer. COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY No advertising No registration No dangerous permissions MORE COOL FEATURES Full retina display support for crystal clear graphics. Also works great on budget devices down to (320x240) resolution. PLAY WITH ALL YOUR FRIENDS Supported Platforms: iOS, Android, Amazon, Blackberry Supported Languages: Chinese, English, Japanese Rules of the game can be found here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dou_Di_Zhu Please send your comments and suggestions to jjplaycardgames@gmail.com User Notes: Your rating is determined by online play against random players. Games with friends do not affect your online rating , but your wins against them are recorded separately. Try to finish a round that has started. If you quit prematurely, you need to pay your all opponents their maximum potential winnings. You can drag cards to reorder them manually. Playing with Facebook friends: To play with friends, from the main menu click “Multiplayer” then “Friends”. You will see available Facebook friends on the right side on the screen. Click “Add” to add friends to your game. Both you and your friends need to be in the game to see each other.

This application program supports KODAK PIXPRO SP360 Camera。 “ PIXPRO SP360 “ app elevates your photography experiences by wirelessly connecting between KODAK PIXPRO SP360 and your Smart Device. You will be able to enjoy 360 degree photo shooting and 360 degree video recording remotely. This APP supports five kinds of visual effects: front, segmentation, dome, ring and panorama for both live view and playback. Users can even set relevant parameters and tag your geo information into photos through Smart Device location services. Through “ PIXPRO SP360 “ app, users can remotely playback images inside of KODAK PIXPRO SP360 Camera, and download images files into Smart Devices then share with your friends and families. description: A RPG twist on the classic arcade Tron game. Similar to the Tron light cycle arcade game or snake. You and your enemies leave lines behind yourself as you move. Don't hit your own or the enemy's lines. Pickup coins and items to help you along the way. Kill enemies by trapping them between lines. Enter the village to visit the shop and proceed to the next level.

Transfermarkt ist die App für alle Fußball Fans. Spieler-Marktwerte sowie die Gerüchteküche zu möglichen Transfers gehören neben News, Spielerwechseln, Statistiken, nationalen und internationalen Ligen und Beraterangaben zu den zentralen Angeboten. Neben der Aktualität besticht Transfermarkt vor allem durch eine große, aktive Community. Diese App ist ein kein Angebot von Transfermarkt.de Transfer market is the app for all football fans. Player market values ​​as well as the rumors on possible transfers include not only news, player Jump, statistics, national and international leagues and consultant information on the key offerings. In addition to the timeliness transfer market impresses with a large, active community. This app is a not an offer of Transfermarkt.de

Word up? A game that will help you to learn correct spelling of the words in a joyful way. Let’s test how quickly you can spell the words and how great is your spelling skills. You must select the missing letter/letters from the option given below the board as quickly as possible before the time runs out. Word will be shown on a board with one or two letters missing. CONTAINS - Arcade mode (Standard classic mode) - Survival mode (will end when a total of 5 mistakes are committed) - Time Attack (60 seconds to complete as much words as you can/wrong answer will affect your score) - Lean mode (Complete as many words you want/no scoring involved) - Easy and hard mode SPECIALS - Leaderboard : Share your score with friends and family - Three separated leaderboards for the three different game modes - Correct spelling list : To help users to increase their spelling skills, it will shows our wrong answers - Achievements : Unlocked by progressing game MORE - Share your stats with your friends and family on gmail, Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Wechat, Meow etc - In-app purchases are included to remove ads and restrictions on your error list.

30/08/2014 Name change from Grammar Nazi Book Worm to Grammar Boss ======= Hi, this is a small game I made (with the help of my friend Phuoc) for my lovely wife. This is a game for people who love reading and want to improve their grammar at the same time. You may add any books of your choice (only text files are allowed as of version 1). This game modifies the texts of the book by randomly including grammatical errors. You may correct the errors as you read and when you are ready hit submit; the game will show you where you were right, where you were wrong and give you a score. As you go on, the scores are added to your overall progress which is accessible through the main menu. I hope this game helps you (and my wife) improve your grammar! ------------------------------------------- If you would like to contribute or if any bugs prevent usage, I would appreciate you logging them on this site\'s issues tab: https://bitbucket.org/anthony_ebin/gnbw/overview

Quick and Easy Notes App to write quick notes on the fly Hand write notes, draw notes, type notes Save and Open notes to SD Card for later recall No background running battery draining services Quick Toolbar for easy note taking Shake to Erase your note - Draw or type - No background draining services - Clean toolbar - Open notes from list of thumbnails - Different background colors - Different drawing colors / sizes - Save to SD Card - Send via Gmail/Mail/Text and any other supported apps - Share Feature - BG / Pencil colors - Export - FREE!

description: League of Legends Counter. First LoL Timer which allows to synchronize with the game and it is updated to the 4.1.patch. You will be notice of the first time to appear and the respawn time of moster of jungle. Key Features: -Updated to version 4.1 patch -Audible alarm when missing 30 sec to respawn -Sync with the time of the game -Terminal remains on while the application is open -Fast, intuitive and easy to operate -Works on both phones and tablets -Only 2 MB -The Internet permission is only for advertising

Mandala Live Wallpaper puts a beautiful mandala in the palm of your hand! A 3D rendered live wallpaper background of a mandala, with beautiful backgrounds and smooth motion. Customize up to 6 simultaneous rotations, change background colors, animated change background color! Not a movie, our wallpapers take full advantage of OpenGL, and support both home screen switching and landscape/portrait modes! TO USE: Home->Press Menu->Wallpapers->Live Wallpapers Not all handsets support the live wallpaper feature, please check for a 'live wallpapers' category as the directions above state.

Photo Meal is a simple way to capture and share your meals. Take photo of everyday meal you'll want to share with people around the world. Whether is a dish you made or one you’re taking in a restaurant, put them in Photo Meal. With Photo Meal, share your meal in a photo feed. Every time you open up Photo Meal, you'll see new photos of dishes from around the world. Discover new meals from around the world every day with Photo Meal. Photo Meal also helps you remember the food you love. It display food photo from everywhere. Top Features: ♥ Instant sharing to Facebook, Twitter, Flickr, Tumblr and Foursquare... ♥ Take as many as pictures of your meals as you wish ♥ Interact with other food lovers through giving & receiving likes Food lovers from the whole world, enjoy new meal with Photo Meal!

description: SEE WHAT TIME IT IS AROUND THE WORLD. 3D World Time displays the current time around the globe. Cities are yellow if currently in daylight or blue if in the dark. The line length is proportional to the city population. Spin the globe and pinch to zoom. OPTIONAL: In app payment to remove the advert and support dev. (If you have any issue please email your device, OS version and full description of the problem).

description: JVC Smartphone Control is an application to operate & control a connected Android device from the touch screen control panel of a supported JVC AV Multimedia Receiver. The Android device must support the Bluetooth HID Profile, HDMI or MHL output. 　　* In order to connect the Android device to the JVC AV Multimedia Receiver, an optional HDMI-MHL Conversion Cable (KS-U61 : sold separately) or HDMI Cable (KS-U60 : sold separately) is required. 　　*5-pin to 11-pin micro USB adapter or HDMI adapter is required when using Samsung products. Functions: - Apps Launcher 　　If the receiver is supported apps launcher function, it can be launch the apps that has been allowed to operate while driving from the launcher home screen. 　　Apps that has been allowed to operate while driving. 　　　　　JVC Smart Music Control 　　　　　TuneIn Radio 　　　　　Waze 　　* In other than the above apps, it is possible only display the screen while driving. - Tap and Drag Operation 　　Tap or drag operation on the Android device can be operated from the touchscreen panel of the receiver. 　　* Does not support multi-touch operation. - HOME/BACK/TASK Buttons 　　HOME / BACK / TASK buttons will be displayed on the screen to operate the Android device even if those buttons are not displayed.In addition, it is possible to minimize these buttons when they are not required and the button location can be moved by dragging. 　　* Those buttons are displayed only while the Android device is connected to the receiver via the Bluetooth connection. 　　* When using some applications (i.e. video application software etc.), there is a possibility that those buttons are not displayed. 　　* If the receiver is supported apps launcher function, it is displayed Launcher HOME / BACK buttons while driving, and HOME / BACK / TASK buttons while parked. 　　* To use the "OK Google" feature, set to turn off the service of this apps in the accessibility settings of the Android device. In this case, HOME / BACK / TASK buttons will not be able to use but will be displayed. - Screen fixed to Landscape mode display / Screen sleep function disabled 　　While the Android device is connected to the receiver, the screen is fixed to landscape display mode and screen sleep function is disabled automatically. 　　* The previous settings will be automatically set after the Bluetooth connection with the receiver is disconnected. 　　* The application is displayed in portrait mode display if it does not support landscape mode display. In this case, the operating range will also change to fit within the display range automatically. 　　* Since the screen sleep function is disabled during the Bluetooth connection to the receiver, there are cases where the battery consumption is increased. - Power Saving Setting (Allow Connection) 　　There is a setting to turn OFF the linkage function with the receiver. 　　If this setting is turned OFF, the battery consumption of Android device will be decreased while the Bluetooth connection with the receiver is disconnected. 　　* To connect to the receiver, this setting should be turned ON again. (It does not turn ON automatically.) To make sure the supported Android devices, the supported JVC AV Multimedia Receivers and FAQ visit the website hereunder: 　　　 http://www.jvc.net/car/app/jsc/index.html Supported Languages: 　　Japanese, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, Russian, Chinese (Simplified) Caution: 　　Please repeat the screen calibration again if you have changed the output screen size of Android device. 　　Do not touch the screen of the Android device during the screen calibration. This could cause the calibration process to fail. 　　No warranty is given as to normal operation of all devices. 　　For information on Bluetooth settings of Android devices please refer to the instruction manual of your device.
release_text: Add Launcher function. Corresponding to OK Google .

In this case, HOME / BACK / TASK buttons will not be able to use but will be displayed. - Screen fixed to Landscape mode display / Screen sleep function disabled 　　While the Android device is connected to the receiver, the screen is fixed to landscape display mode and screen sleep function is disabled automatically. 　　* The previous settings will be automatically set after the Bluetooth connection with the receiver is disconnected. 　　* The application is displayed in portrait mode display if it does not support landscape mode display. To make sure the supported Android devices, the supported KENWOOD Multimedia / Navigation Receivers and FAQ visit the website hereunder: 　　　 http://www.kenwood.com/products/car_audio/app/kenwood_smartphone_control/eng/compatible.html 　　To get the latest firmware and information visit the website hereunder (Recommend): 　　　 http://www.kenwood.com/cs/ce/firmware/index.html Supported Languages: 　　Japanese, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, Dutch, Russian, Chinese (Simplified) Caution: 　　Please repeat the screen calibration again if you have changed the output screen size of Android device. 　　Do not touch the screen of the Android device during the screen calibration. This could cause the calibration process to fail. 　　No warranty is given as to normal operation of all devices.

description: JVC Audio Control BR1 is an application that allows you to use your smartphone as a remote control for JVC compatible devices. Main Features ・Remote control function: Control JVC compatible devices remotely via Bluetooth using Android devices.You can perform the following operations: power on/off, volume, sound mode, source switching (CD, USB, iPod, FM, AM,DAB, Bluetooth, AUDIO IN, PC IN), play, stop, skip, repeat/random, record, timer, etc. And you can display the name of the files in the USB connected. ・Player function: Perform basic operations on music files on the Android device such as play, stop, skip, repeat/random, etc. Compatible devices ・NX-SA55, UX-L5, RV-NB75/NB85/NB100, RD-W1 (As of October 2014) Caution ・Use with devices that run on Android OS2.3.3 and above. ・This application can't be supported on all Android devices.

JVC Audio control BR2 is a remote control app. for supported JVC products. Function: Remote control via Bluetooth - Power ON/OFF, volume, sound mode, source, dimmer and muting　and etc. Supported products: - SP-ABT30 (as of June,2014) Supported devices: Requires Android OS 2.3.3 or later. SPP profile must be supported. Notes No assurance is given that the app will work on a particular device.

Basic function ( Search/ Playback/ Stop / Skip / Repeat / Shuffle / Control of volume ) Support items ・UX-N5, RV-S5 (As of June/ 2013) Caution ・Please use since Android OS2.3.　 ・This APP can't be supported on all Android devices. ・This application is compatible with MP3.　Please refer to the HELP for app, for more details.

"JVC Audio Control WR2" is an application for remote-control that allows to control selected JVC products with your devices. Functions ・Power on/off ・Volume up/down (level adjustment) ・Select input ・Select network services ・Bass, Treble up/down (Tone control) ・Display of the contents information Caution ・When you connect your compatible JVC product to your wireless LAN router, wired LAN connection is necessary. And when you use this app, wireless connection is necessary via Android device and the wireless LAN router. ・Please use since Android OS 2.2.2 ・This application does not support tablet devices. ・This application cannot supported on all Android devices. ・Languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese

It has access to over 14 thousand courses. E-mail any questions and if you like it, please rate it! version 1.12

The most realistic DBZ scouter from Tokyo JAPAN! Z-Scouter searches and scouts automatically in camera preview. You don't need to take photo any more since live scouting is available. You can take last one if your device has no Android face detection API. How to use 1 Lock the target. 2 Tap the target to measure fighting power level.

app_name: Keep Calm and Have Fun Free
description: The Keep Calm Poster creator, You can change the words, icon and colors to create unique and witty variations of the original poster. You can even add one of the supplied background images. Once you have created your masterpiece, you can save it to your phone and post on your Facebook wall. All Features available on Menu: - Change any of the text - Change the text and icon - Change the icon (approx 74) - Change the background color - Use one of the supplied background images - Save your poster to the Picture Library - Use pictures from your library or take a new picture to use as a background - Change fonts family and font size - You can reset position of icon and text as you want by touch icon or text and move them. USAGE: On touch devices simply tap the icon or text to change. On keyboard devices use the track pad to highlight the item you want to change and then click. Options are available on the menu to change text and background colors as well as save poster. Once you have created your unique poster, why not use it as a wallpaper or share it on Facebook, email etc. Enjoy :)

It has been recently scientifically proven that regular mental exercise can greatly improve your memory. This app has been designed to do just that! In particular, Test your memory ! Discover all animals pairs by checking two squares each time. Are you ready to challenge your memory daily with "Memory Game" ? A great game to exercise your memory ! GAME FEATURES - Match pairs of stones - Different levels of difficulty - Colorful images of stones to be easily remembered A free memory game for kids and adults . Brain trainer . Pairs game. Brain & Puzzle game - best from memory kids apps

Robo Jump is a fun and addictive jumping game that features simple concept and great presentation. The new update adds enough new content to make revisiting the famous jumping worthwhile. The objective of Robo Jump is very simple. Just drive up the little character on platform, ignoring hurdles and enemies to climb as high as possible. The graphics are nothing more than ‘Robos’ and the small little drawings are performed to occupy the mind. You have to tilt the device screen to kill the occasional monster that blocks your way. Robo Jump features a cleverly integrated leader board and a hand-scribbled aesthetic. The interface is user friendly. You automatically keep jumping and gently tilt the device to move right and left. As you go higher, you jump onto an increasingly difficult and challenging arrangement of platforms such as crumbling brown platforms, moving blue platforms, platforms with jump-boosting springs. Robo Jump has no music and it is not possible to resize the window. However, you can select to play with the mouse or the arrow keys on the board. This game is known for its originality and simplicity. You understand immediately how it runs and it remains stuck for hours trying to raise his small little Robo even higher. The core game play remains the same but new updates and themes add an overall dark feel. New items and characters add more fun and excitement to the game. Overall Robo Jump is a nice game to kill the time. People of any age would love to play it over and over again. Go for it.
Amazing SnowFall Live Wallpaper HD ! Works on mobiles and tabs. Support any screen size, in portrait or landscape mode. You can configure the speed of snowfall

Play with this amusing and addicting cartoon mini golf game. If you are tired of the classical mini golf games with the usual ball and the classic gameplay, try something new! Meet one of the most entertaining birds on the planet. Our flappy friend lives on an abandoned amusement island, where you can find any of the coolest mini golf tracks (courses) on earth. My bird has a huge passion for mini golf but there are no golf clubs (sticks) and balls to play with, he has reinvented the game concept. He blows up his clumsy body until he looks like a ball and uses a slingshot to move towards the hole. After the first shot the game play will change from slingshot modus to arrow modus with a power bar, for a more precise stroke. Advice: Remember that the first hit will be the most difficult, so do not put too much strength in it because it will simply make our fluffy friend, fly out of the track. Don't hit the bird into the sea - it doesn't like to be a subsurfer... Cool gamefeat: ✓ Awesome 3D graphics ✓ Cute animal characters and animations with dancing and balancing birds ✓ 4 fun courses with over 70 holes ✓ Simple, drag-and-release gameplay mechanic for the slingshot ✓ Direction arrow with power bar for the successive stroke - just touch it ✓ Realistic physics and ball movement ✓ Collectible coins and jewels to increase your score ✓ Easy and funny to play Try to find the shortest and easiest path to the hole in order to rise your score. Let's make it with no more than 3 par (hits) and you will get three stars. There are also collectible coins and jewels that can increase your final score like crazy. If you collect one gem you will get back one par (stroke) which means that you have higher possibilities to get 3 stars. Enjoy hours of fun with this challenging free app! It's a big fun for kids, parents, adults and everybody!

Join Stickman in one of the most exciting run adventures ever. Stickman is a Ninja character that has been sucked in by a mysterious vortex while meditating at a temple. At the end of its journey he had to realize that, he ended up in another dimension (parallel world). Since the day he has been sucked into the tornado his only thought is to try and get home as fast as possible. The problem is that he has to find another inter dimensional portal, that will hopefully teleport him back in his dimension. Along his path he will encounter countless obstacles, pitfalls and monsters that will require all of his ninja skills to be overcome. Help Stickman to get through all his battles and reach the next portal that could bring him one step closer to his home. Run on al 4 sides of the tunnel by skipping sideways quickly to avoid obstacles you cannot jump over. Use the sword to cut down the clumsy monsters that you will encounter on your path and all the paper obstacles that obstruct your way. Also collect special weapons that can help you accomplish your mission. 3, 2, 1 go! Start a unique running adventure game with the most skillful Stickman ever seen. How to play: - To Jump swipe up, to jump higher swipe twice quickly. - To move, swipe to the left or to the right. - To get onto another floor, swipe to the left or to the right when your are running along the wall. - To use the blade or any other weapon tap on the screen. Features: ★ Original 3D-run function combines jumping, turning and cutting / shooting. ★ Colorful graphics and smooth animations ★ The coolest ninja Stickman ever to play with! ★ Many different levels to conquer ★ Special abilities and weapons: ✔Ink: Makes you invincible and faster for 5 seconds (The only thing you have to remember is to jump if you encounter precipices) ✔Shotgun: To blast away all the paper obstacles on your path (The bullet destroys more objects with one shot). ✔Flame thrower: Burns al the paper obstacles and enemies down (can eliminate more things with one shot). Advice: Don’t be caught from the glue as it will slow you down a lot for some seconds Rush through the tunnel and fight to save Stickman’s life and bring him back to his beloved homeland! This app is a Premium version "without ads" of Stickman Run 4D

Tracker Booster is a small utility to help sports tracker applications (e.g. Endomondo) or Google Maps to get best possible GPS signal by keeping the GPS unit active in the background. Some phones have problems using e.g. Endomondo while not getting accurate GPS location info. Without and with Tracker Booster result images attached. Google Maps looses the GPS signal when phone falls into power saving mode. This application keeps the GPS busy so that Google Maps is always in correct location when you need it.
release_text: Ver 1.8: Bugfix on application stopping by itself in certain conditions. Ver 1.7: Changed the application to support devices with small screens, for example Sony Xperia Mini Pro. Updates on Russian translation.

developer: KavraKids - best games for boys,girls and toddlers
description: Are you intrigued by monsters? Ghosts? Halloween and all the scary, spooky things you have seen only heard about? Then you have come to the right place! In this toddler & kiddies scratch game you will see many types of monsters! Kiddies Monster Scratch Off Game is a classic kiddies scratching game where a layer of some kind is scratched off to reveal a hidden monster image behind. The monsters and game concept are suitable for youngsters to learn about colors, shapes, ghosts and monsters. Much time and effort has been put into this scratching game, for example the swiping mechanics that will scratch off the top layer. It should be easy to do for a 1 year old, while still keeping 2,3 and year old youngsters entertained. When the top layer is scratched off your kid discovers the monsters beneath, they are friendly and not scary. Our test group shows that kiddies often laugh and get happy when seeing these monsters and ghosts. The music is intended to be dynamic and intriguing, keeping your kiddie occupied with the game while still being pleasent for parents to listen to. Features * 18 levels, 8 free and 10 unlockable (childproof in-app purchase). * 8 different types of layers to scratch off to reveal the monster; solid color, black and white, twisted, blurred, frosted, tiled, crystallized and inverted colours. On old devices only a subset of layers are supported. * Colorful HD graphics * This kiddies monster scratch off game is suitable for toddlers and preschool kiddies (both boys and girls).

description: Custom Watch for SmartWatch is a fully customizable watch. This Smart extension works with Sony SmartWatch 1 (MN2) and Sony SmartWatch 2 (SW2). Features: * usable as normal wrist watch * build in clock designer for individual analog clocks * 20 individual watch designs * 8 digital clocks and 12 predefined analog clocks * supporting Low Power Mode * choose your own designed clock face, clock hands * choose backgroundimage from your gallery * customizable textcolor * customizable backgroundcolor * customizable clocksize (only for digital clocks) * customizable clockposition (only for digital clocks) * customizable clock face color, clock hands color (only for analog clocks) * switch between 12h and 24h format * show phone battery level ATTENTION: Custom Watch does not work with Sony LiveView! FAQ ======== Question 1: Does the Custom Watch replace the native watch? Answer: No. Nobody can replace the native watch. But we implemented an autostart option for Custom Watch on SmartWatch 2. This means Custom Watch will start automatically so it will almost feel like the native watch. On your SmartWatch 1 you can run the "Custom Watch" with the option "Use as wrist watch" to run the "Custom Watch" App permanently till you stop this app. It will also restart after connection is lost. Question 2: Does the "Custom Watch" decrease the battery life of my SmartWatch? Answer: Sure. If you use an app it will always reduce the battery life on all devices, especialy if use it permanently. But, thanks to Sonys last update the low power mode can be used on Sony SmartWatch 2 (SW2) now. So we maximized the battery lifetime for SmartWatch2. For SmartWatch 1 users here are some tips: The display of the Smart Watch decrease the battery life most, so we implemented two options for you: * "Dim after 10 seconds" to dim down the SmartWatch display after 10 seconds till you touch the display. * "Stand by after 10 seconds" to turns of the display after 10 seconds and will wake up after touching the display. So it is your choice how much energy you save. Question 3: Is it possible to display the battery level of the SmartWatch. Answer: No. There is no possibility to read out the battery sensor of the SmartWatch at this time. Smart extension for SmartWatch 2 Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2 LiveWare™ extension for SmartWatch custom clock for SmartWatch

description: Suchen Sie vielseitigen, digitalen Rätselspaß? Suchen Sie nicht weiter. Die kompakte App von Megastar bietet ein variationsreiches Angebot vieler beliebter Rätseltypen wie Sudoku, Wortsuche, Schwedenrätsel, Kreuzworträtsel, Gitterrätsel, Zahlenrätsel und Blockpuzzle. Unsere Rätselvarianten lassen sich perfekt auf dem Tablet spielen. Ob Sie nun einen Zeitvertreib suchen, um Wartezeiten zu überbrücken oder etwas für Ihre grauen Zellen tun möchten, indem Sie knifflige Kopfnüsse knacken: die Megastar Rätsel-App bietet für jeden genau das Richtige. Genießen Sie spannende Unterhaltung und trainieren Sie gleichzeitig Ihr Gedächtnis und logisches Denkvermögen. Die verschiedenen Rätsel stehen in mehreren Schwierigkeitsstufen zur Verfügung, so dass garantiert keine Langeweile aufkommt! Und das Beste: Alle Rätselvarianten können gratis ausprobiert werden! Und wenn Sie das Rätselfieber erst einmal gepackt hat, stehen jeden Sonntag umfangreiche neue Editionen zum Download bereit. Bitte registrieren Sie sich so schnell wie möglich bei der App, um sicher zu stellen, dass Ihre Rätsel wiederherstellbar bleiben und auf ein anderes Tablet heruntergeladen werden können. Durch Server- oder PlayStore-Probleme kann es passieren, dass Rätsel nicht-registrierter Benutzer gelöscht werden. Wir sind gespannt, wie Ihnen unsere App gefällt. Fragen, Anmerkungen oder vielleicht auch Lob können Sie an android.support@keesing.com senden. Wir freuen uns, von Ihnen zu hören! Viel Spaß beim Rätseln! Ihr Megastar Team Search versatile digital puzzles fun? Look no further. The compact app Megastar is varied and offers many popular types of puzzles like Sudoku, Word Search, Sweden puzzles, crossword puzzles, grid puzzles, number puzzles and block puzzles. Our puzzle variants can be played perfectly on the tablet. Whether you are looking for a pastime to bridge waiting times or want to do something for your gray cells by crack tricky brain teasers: Megastar puzzle app offers for each fit the bill. Enjoy exciting entertainment and exercise at the same time your memory and logic skills. The various puzzles are available in several levels of difficulty, so that guarantees not get bored! And the best part: All puzzles variants can be tried for free! And if you have once packed the mystery fever, are every Sunday substantial new editions for download. Please register as soon as possible in the app to make sure that your mysteries remain recoverable, and can be downloaded to another tablet. Through server or PlayStore problems it may happen that puzzles non-registered user will be deleted. We are excited to see how you like our app. Questions, comments, or maybe even praise you can send to android.support @ keesing.com. We look forward to hearing from you! Have fun puzzles! Your Mega Star Team

description: A 3-dimensional, stabilized ball compass. The perfect combination of simplicity, beauty and performance. This is the ad-free version of 3D Ball Compass. Features: * Beautiful designed ball compass * High precision and stability (special filter algorithm) * Highly responsive (uses gyroscope) * Various calibration methods * Nothing more, just a compass. But a good one (I hope ;-) This app is being continuously improved further. It also serves as a testing ground for my other compass app "AR GPS Compass 3D". New features / improvements to this app will also find their way in there, eventually. Your feedback is highly appreciated! Permissions explained: Access coarse location: This permission is necessary to fetch information about the geomagnetic field at your current position. Thats all for now, have fun, Alex :-)

3D Compass and Waypoint Finder with Map and Augmented Reality Display! This is the ad-free Pro-Version of AR GPS Compass Map 3D. It introduces some additional nice features (see below). If you are looking for the Free-Version , please check my other apps. You can find it there. Features (Summary): * Augmented Reality display * High precision and stability (special filter algorithm) * Map with GPS Location ( Pro-Version : choose between auto-rotating or fixed) * Calibration ( Pro-Version : Extended calibration, including deviation tables) * Displays GPS information * Measure the height of large objects * Measure magnetic field strength (metal detector) * Magnetic field strength warning (indicates magnetic influences) * Geocaching: Easily define and find waypoints * Share waypoints or your current location with other users * Define waypoints by specifying latitude / longitude in various formats * Define waypoints by a long-press on the map * Define waypoints by specifying distance and bearing * Real3D support! Detailed description: Augmented Reality GPS Compass Map 3D Pro displays a 3D compass that gets combined with the camera image. Your current location from GPS is shown on a separate fixed or rotating map with adjustable size. Unlike most other apps, the compass uses a very effective fusion and filtering algorithm to combine the values of the magnetic field sensor, the accelerometer and the gyroscope (if installed in your device) to achieve a maximum in precision and stability. The Pro-Version features a simple but effective calibration that increases the accuracy of the compass even further! A magnetic field strength warning indicates the possible influence of metallic objects or power-lines. You can define your own waypoints. In this case a green arrow on top of the compass always points towards the selected waypoint. (Geocaching is really fun with it :-) New waypoints can be defined by a long-click on the map, by specifying latitude and longitude, or by specifying distance and heading from an existing waypoint. You can also share your current location and the locations of your waypoints with your friends. On devices with LG's Real3D technology (e.g. the LG P920 Optimus 3D or the LG P720 Optimus 3D Max), the app features a 3D stereoscopic view of the compass and the camera image. The app is still being developed further, so please feel free to send your comments or suggestions to the developers e-mail address provided below. Your feedback is highly appreciated!

This is the School Edition (SE) of the super popular 4th Grade Learning Games. This version allows schools and teachers to purchase all the games at full price without using in-app purchases. The content is the same as if the normal free version was fully unlocked. 10 all-new educational mini-games for 4th Graders! Help them learn important topics like fractions, spelling, graphs, division, geometry, grammar and more all while they are playing fun and engaging mini-games. They won’t even realize they’re learning important 4th grade concepts as they fly spaceships, race cars, and throw darts. All 10 games are designed using real fourth grade curriculums and are modeled after Common Core State Standards. These lessons are perfect for children about to enter fourth grade, or for current fourth graders who need a bit of helping mastering a specific lesson. Games: * Fractions - Compare, add, subtract, and multiply fractions * Word Problems - Multi-step word problems using addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division * Angles and Geometry - Use a protractor and learn about different types of angles * Graphs and Grids - Read a variety of graphs and use coordinates to plot points * Patterns - Fill in missing values, identify number growths, and time increments * Missing Vowels - Use missing vowels to complete words * Spelling - Spell hundreds of different words * Punctuation and Grammar - Fix sentences by dragging the correct punctuation * Synonyms and Antonyms - Identify different words that mean the same or opposite * Homophones - Learn about words that sound the same, but have different meanings Perfect for kids and students who need a fun and entertaining educational game to play. ===================================== If you enjoy this app, please try all of our fun and educational apps for kids: Preschool and Kindergarten Learning Games Barnyard Games For Kids 101 Kids Puzzles 1st Grade Learning Games 2nd Grade Learning Games 3rd Grade Learning Games 4th Grade Learning Games 5th Grade Learning Games 6th Grade Learning Games Barnyard Puzzles For Kids Coloring Book Fun Preschool Learning Fun Owl and Pals Preschool Lessons

Do you get butterflies in your stomach at the thought of meeting new people and starting a conversation? Having trouble meeting your kind of person? You are not alone. Millions of others, just like you, want to find a date too. All you have to know is how to. Increase your chances of meeting likeminded people and getting them to agree to date you (or to even ask you for a date). Here is what you will learn inside... ★ What Online Dating Services are all About ★ How Online Dating Sites Work ★ Online Dating Tips for Beginners ★ Online Dating Help for Newbies: Writing Your Profile ★ Choosing Online Dating Sites for Beginners ★ Why So Many Beginners Use Online Dating Sites ★ Common Do's and Don'ts for Online Dating ★ Avoiding the Common Online Dating Scams ★ Online Dating Site Steps for Newbies ★ Online Dating: Free Trial Memberships for Beginners ★ Keeping the Riskiness Out of Online Dating ★ Getting to Know People on Online Dating Sites ★ Advantages of Online Dating for Beginners ★ Choosing an Online Dating Site ★ Precautions to Take with Online Dating ★ Online Dating: Filling Out Your Profile ★ Can Online Dating Sites Help You Find Your Soul mate? ★ Ways to Be Safe ★ Dating for the First Time ★ First Date Tips for Men ★ How to Make A Woman Find You Attractive ★ Dating Tips for Women ★ Breaking the Ice on the First Date ★ Making Sure the First Date is Not the Only Date ★ First Time Online Dating Tips for Beginners ★ and much, Much More! *** On Sale Now! (Normal Price $16.99) *** Get it now before promotion ends!

Discover How to Sky-Rocket Your Self-Esteem And The Invaluable Techniques to Leadership Transformation! Does it seem as though some people just effortlessly glide through life with incredible self esteem and the personality to match? Would you like to be one of those people? The answer is probably yes. You may have thought that some people are just naturally born with wonderful self esteem and confidence; however, in most cases this is not the case. In today’s fast paced world it is important that we all work towards developing self esteem. Self development is an extremely important part of life. In order to lead a better, happier life it is extremely important that you educate yourself about self esteem and personal transformation. Everything you need to know about the self esteem and personal transformation is included in this special report. Here is what you will discover inside... ★ New age and personal transformation ★ Transforming your personal self esteem ★ Exercises for transforming your self esteem ★ Building self esteem through personal transformation ★ Routes to personal transformation and self esteem ★ Writing toward personal transformation ★ Self transformation tips ★ and much, Much More! *** On Sale Now! (Normal Price $12.99) *** Get it now before promotion ends!

Cure Irritable Bowel Syndrome The Natural Way! Stop Making Things Worse By Using Dangerous Prescription and Over-The-Counter Drugs! Are IBS Symptoms Ruining Your Entire Life? Do You Want The Digestive System You Were Born With Back? Have you become paralyzed by the symptoms of Irritable Bowel Syndrome? Are you weary of the nausea, cramps, bloating, gas, constipation and sexual fears caused by this uncomfortable yet very common condition? Having IBS can be pretty painful. You never know what to expect from one day to the next! You are either running to the toilet with a serious case of the runs or so constipated that you can barely move. Here is what you will learn inside... ★ What role stress plays in causing IBS ★ What it means to have a "sensitive colon" ★ How doctors determine how severe the condition is in any individual sufferer ★ Why the condition of Irritable Bowel Syndrome is so difficult to diagnose in the first place! ★ A description of the other medical conditions and afflictions that IBS shares symptoms with and is commonly confused with! ★ A discussion of both the Manning Criteria and the Rome III Criteria which are used by doctors to officially diagnosis a case of IBS ★ Why both loose bowels and constipation are both symptoms of the condition ★ What types of bowel movements to look for in your toilet bowel that may indicate that you have IBS ★ The physical symptoms that many people suffer when they have IBS ★ What anxiety or depression may have to do with IBS ★ How allopathic doctors test for a positive diagnosis of IBS ★ How the use of laxatives can make it difficult to diagnose the condition ★ Discussing the role that fiber can take in either improving your condition or making it much worse! ★ How to determine which foods irritate your colon the worst - these are your trigger foods! ★ How to differentiate a stimulating food (a good thing!) from an irritating food (a bad thing!) ★ Where to find your best sources of soluble fiber which can greatly alleviate the discomfort of elimination when you suffer form IBS ★ Why you should eat your soluble fiber first before you eat any other food at a meal and how that can help prevent unpleasant symptoms ★ How to avoid gaining weight when trying to manage this problem ★ Why egg yolks are not the best thing for an IBS sufferer to eat ★ The role that fried foods, like French Fries and onion rings can play in aggravating your condition ★ Why eating red meat can make IBS worse ★ The role that coffee, colas and other caffeinated beverages can play in making your IBS worse ★ Letting you know why carbonation of any kind is not good for an IBS sufferer to ingest, even if it is diet or contains no sugar ★ Explaining once and for all why all IBS sufferers should avoid ingesting artificial sweeteners ★ What the common ingredient in Chinese food, fried chicken and even store bought lemonade is that can cause problems with your bowels ★ Informing you of the very best brand of commercial fiber that is available to buy on the market today ★ How consuming probiotics can help regulate the behavior of your stomach and bowels ★ How consuming digestive enzymes can help you with this condition ★ The name of the two minerals that you absolutely must not be deficient in if you are going to cure your condition ★ A list of food s that contain chemicals or enzymes that are well-known stomach irritants, the kind of substances that are likely to cause anyone who suffers from irritable bowel syndrome a very unpleasant reaction. ★ and much, Much More! *** On Sale Now! (Normal Price $18.99) *** Get it now before promotion ends!

Discover the Bad Breath Secrets! Call it bad breath or halitosis; it’s an acutely unpleasant situation that’s the real reason for embarrassment. Many of us with bad breath aren’t even aware there’s a real problem. Acute bad breath is a very common problem caused by such things as oral dryness, stress, hunger, eating certain foods such as garlic and onions, smoking, and poor oral care. Morning breath is a typical example of transient bad breath. However, Chronic bad breath is a far more serious condition affecting one quarter of the population. Here is what you will learn inside... ★ What is Halitosis? ★ Causes of Bad Breath ★ Diagnosis for Bad Breath ★ Home Care to Reduce Bad Breath ★ Practical Tips on Smelling and Breathing Well *** On Sale Now! (Normal Price $12.99) *** Get it now before promotion ends!
