description: БАЗОВЫЙ КУРС АНГЛИЙСКОГО - 16 УРОКОВ. ! Вышла версия с ПРОДВИНУТЫМ курсом, устанавливайте https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kostosha.poliglot16.pro Официальное приложение, поддерживается лично Дмитрием Петровым. Внимание: все другие приложения с названием "Полиглот" не имеют отношения к системе Дмитрия Петрова. Для гарантии результата, устанавливайте только официальное приложение. ============ Как изменить произношение ========= Google Android недавно обновил встроенный синтезатор речи. Если вам не понравился голос, смените его на другой, таким образом: Настройки (android) - Спец. Возможности - Синтез речи - Система по умолчанию - выберите Pico TTS (или другой) Пользователи о приложении: "Отличное приложение! Думал стоит ли покупать. Купил. Программа замечательная, стоит своих денег!!!!! Огромное спасибо разработчикам!!!" Замечательное приложение!!! Я в восторге от программы, действительно помогает довести до автоматизма базовую структуру времен глаголов!" ====== ПОЛИГЛОТ 16 - это полный курс английского языка за 16 уроков ! Более 70 тематических тренировок. Эффективная методика с грамматическими пояснениями дают 100% результат. Данное приложение будет очень полезно всем кто смотрел популярное реалити-шоу "Полиглот. Выучим английский за 16 часов!" ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ ПРИЛОЖЕНИЯ: ► Озвучивание ответов ► Статистика ответов ► Вспомогательная таблица ► Словарь к тренировкам ► Наглядная визуальная подсказка ► режим запоминания слов и фраз ► Полный конспект 16 уроков телепередачи ► Встроенное описание грамматики к каждой тренировке, к каждому предложению ТЕМЫ ГРАММАТИКИ ► Личные, притяжательные, возвратные, неопределенные местоимения. ► Основная схема глагола. ► Времена: simple, continuous, perfect. ► Глаголы: все формы. ► Глагол to be. ► Страдательный залог. ► Предлоги ► Прилагательные: степени сравнения ► Параметры времени ► Побудительные и повелительные предложения ► Условные предложения, союз "чтобы" ► Модальные глаголы: can, should ► Порядковые числительные РАЗГОВОРНЫЕ ТЕМЫ ► О себе, чем я занимаюсь ► Этикет: приветствия, прощания ► Чувственные состояния ► О погоде ► и многие другие РЕЖИМЫ "Запоминание слов и фраз" "Составление предложений" "Cвободная тренировка" НЕКОТОРЫЕ СОВЕТЫ: ► Тренировки проходятся последовательно. ► Для подсказки пользуйтесь "быстрой справкой" - слева внизу значок вопроса. ► Чтобы отменить выбранное слово - коснитесь предложения. ► Чтобы сменить предложение - смахните на строке предложения справа налево. Если проблемы с озвучкой: - может появляться сообщение «Language not support» Необходимо установить речевой движок: «Настройки-Язык и клавиатура-Синтез речи-Настройки- Установить речевые данные" ОБРАТНАЯ СВЯЗЬ Любые пожелания присылайте на почту: poliglot_tv@enapp.ru Если встретили ошибку - присылайте также на почту: poliglot_tv@enapp.ru , будем благодарны. BASIC COURSE English - 16 lessons. ! New version with advanced courses, set https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kostosha.poliglot16.pro Official application, supported personally by Dmitry Petrov. Note: All other applications called "Polyglot" irrelevant to the system Dmitry Petrov. To guarantee results, install only official app. How to change the pronunciation ============ ========= Google Android has recently updated the built-speech synthesizer. If you do not like the voice, change it to the other, thus: Settings (android) - Spec. Opportunities - Speech Synthesis - System default - select Pico TTS (or other) App users: "Great app! Think it is worth buying. Bought. The program is great, worth the money!! Many thanks to developers! " Wonderful app! I am delighted with the program really helps to bring to the basic structure of automatism tense! " ====== Polyglot 16 - it is a complete English course for 16 lessons! More than 70 thematic training. Effective technique with grammatical explanations given 100% result. This application is very useful to all those who watched the popular reality show "Polyglot. Learned English for 16 hours!" Possible applications: ► Sound answers ► Statistics answers ► Reference Table ► dictionary to training ► A clear visual cue ► mode of memorizing words and phrases ► Full synopsis 16 lessons telecast ► Built-in grammar description for each workout, each proposal GRAMMAR TOPICS ► Personal, possessive, reflexive, indefinite pronouns. ► The basic scheme of the verb. ► Times: simple, continuous, perfect. ► verbs: all forms. ► The verb to be. ► The passive voice. ► Prepositions ► Adjectives: degrees of comparison ► Time Options ► Incentive imperative and offers ► Conditional Sentences, union "to" ► Modal verbs: can, should ► Ordinal numbers CONVERSATION TOPICS ► About what I do ► Etiquette: greetings, goodbyes ► Sensual state ► About the weather ► and many others MODES "Memorizing words and phrases" "Preparation of proposals" "Free Standing training" SOME TIPS: ► training takes place sequentially. ► To use the tips "quick reference" - the question mark at the bottom left. ► To cancel the selected word - Touch offers. ► To change the offer - whisk on line offers right to left. If problems with the voice acting: - Message may appear «Language not support» You must install the speech engine "Settings-Language & keyboard-Speech Synthesis-Settings-Install voice data" FEEDBACK Any wishes send on e-mail: poliglot_tv@enapp.ru If you see errors - also send mail to: poliglot_tv@enapp.ru , we are grateful.
release_text: версия 2.3 - исправлен баг со статистикой (когда не открывались тренировки) - исправлены некоторые ошибки - исправлен вылет на 11 и 13 уроках Если найдете еще - пишите на почту (через приложение - центр Петрова-написать разработчику) Спасибо Всем кто пишет о проблемах! версия 2.2 - добавлена ландшафтная ориентация для планшетов - скорректирован синтезатор речи (глагол live) - исправлена, часто возникающая ошибка, которая рушила приложение - исправлены другие ошибки

app_name: Show The Way (Where is My Car)
description: Are you in a important place? And do you need to come this place later? "Show The Way" saves your place, detect your address and navigate your saved location. *** And now - you can find your car - automatically! *** Remembers where you parked without any intervention from your side. Just click on the green car icon to find your way back to the car! "Show The Way" features: - Automatic car finder - Find place - Park time (click on saved icon) - Navigate to saved location (draw a path to saved location) - Manuel location (double tap on map) - Photo taking for indoor - Compass - Address detection For any problem don't make comments, please send an e-mail. keywords: GPS, network, navigation, park, car, where is my car, time, direction, maps, save, address, address detection, photo, path, pin. Show The Way (Where is my Car?) Galaxy S2, Galaxy S3, Nexus, HTC One X, Tablets(Nexus 10 ve Note 10.1) Sony Xperia Galaxy Note 2.

description: Play Reversi with your friends. You can play online with Google Play Games or you can play in pass and play local mode. You can challenge 5 different computer players as well. Full version without ads and with better quality of graphics.

Sheep Launcher, one of the most addictive #1 game on iTunes is finally available on Android! Push the big red button to launch the sheep. Keep tapping him as fast as you can while he’s in the air to boost him higher. On the way up, collect powerup items such as helium tank, rocket pack and flying saucer. Pick up as many stars as you can along the way to increase your final score. The higher you climb, the more challenging it gets! Compete against players worldwide and see if you can grab one of the coveted Top 50 Players spot! Purchase the full version and see if you have what it takes to go beyond our Solar System and discover what's really out there. It is a huge universe... Full Version Game Features: • No ads • 7 additional playable characters with different attributes • Massive universe • Addictive game play • Endless replayability • Hand drawn animation • Soothing classical music • Nostalgic cartoon sound effects • Play your own iPod music during gameplay • Hilarious ranking system • Personal high score tracking • Global high score leader board

description: Krypto is a mathematics strategy game suitable for everyone. Exercise your mental math skills in this challenging and addictive arithmetic game! Deal five cards and use basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) to reach the Goal value. Select operations from the diamond-shaped Operation Buttons below the cards. Move the cards, select and change operations, place/remove parentheses to calculate the Goal! Scoring: --The faster you reach the Goal, the higher your rank! --If your time is in the Top Ten, add your name to the Top Ten list. --See the Top Ten list by pressing the “Top Ten” icon. Features: --MOVE cards from one location to another by dragging them with your finger. --CHANGE AN OPERATION by selecting a new one from the Operation Button below. --CLEAR AN OPERATION by touching it in the Play Area. --PLACE PARENTHESES AROUND CARDS by simultaneously touching them in the Play Area. --CLEAR PARENTHESES AROUND CARDS by simultaneously touching the cards again. --Stumped on how to solve it? Press STOP AND SOLVE to see a solution! Settings: PREVIEW: Select up to ten seconds to “preview” your Krypto hand before the Goal is visible. DISPLAY CALCULATIONS: With this feature you can see if the way you’ve set up your cards matches your “mental math.” DISPLAY RESULT: Play with the result of your calculations as you develop your “mental math” skills, then play without for greater challenge. SOUND EFFECTS: Play with sound or without. Save: Saves your setting changes and returns you to the main screen. Return: Returns you to the main screen without saving changes.

A classic bird shooter game. Shoot the bird as set in the mission. Don't shoot other birds, or you will waste bullets & get negative scores. Catch bonus bullets from falling parachutes or the if you finish the bullets, game may end. Enjoy this game and suggest us improvements...

description: Galaxy Warriors is a shoot them up type of game. Goal of this game is to save the galaxy from evil. There are many levels like:- Save the Mercury Save the Venus Save the Earth Save the Mars Save the Jupiter To clear a level, you need to score maximum scores and destroy maximum alien ships.

Kids ABC game is an interactive game for teaching ABC to your kids. Each alphabet is associated with 4 pictures and the sounds for each picture. For example:- - for alphabet A, we have apple, ant, ambulance etc. - for alphabet B, we have bat, ball, book, box etc. Happy studying.

description: Welcome to the easiest-to-use ringtone personalization application on the Android™ Market. Simply press your selection of one of the top 45 most-popular loudest alarm ringtones ever. Then, press the play button to preview your loudest alarm selection. Press the red "x" to go back to the loudest alarm ringtone choices or press the green check mark to: * Set the loudest alarm ringtone to your default ringtone * Set the loudest alarm ringtone to your notification sound * Set the loudest alarm ringtone to your alarm * Set the loudest alarm ringtone to a specific contact It's as easy as that! Best of all, its free! Any and all permissions are either for application performance or advertiser performance. KlearTones prides itself on never collecting or storing user data and uses spam free banner ads.

The official Kentucky Wildcats Gameday application is a must-have for fans headed to campus or following the Wildcats from afar. With FREE LIVE AUDIO, interactive social media, and all the scores and stats surrounding the game, the Kentucky Wildcats Gameday application is a must-have. Features Include: + LIVE GAME AUDIO - Listen to free live audio for all football and men’s basketball games + SOCIAL STREAM - View and contribute to real-time Instagram & Twitter feeds from the team and fans + FAN GUIDE - The official Gameday Fan Guide with key times, events, and the need-to-know information to plan your gameday + INTERACTIVE STADIUM MAPS - Enhanced location aware in-venue maps for fans, with key points for Commonwealth Stadium, tailgating and parking + SCORES & STATS - All the scores, stats, and play-by-play information that fans need and expect during live games + SEC and TOP 25 SCORES – Live scoring from across the conference and Top 25 + ALERTS - Custom alert notifications to let fans know everything surrounding Gameday

description: Welcome to the Jungle, welcome to Animal Pals! The matching game - one of the classic games that children have adored for many generations is now in the palm of their hands: with Animal Pals. Join the curious crew as your child races against the clock to remember and match each card with it’s pair! We have brought back the classic in a modern form, something that your child will be captivated by and adore. Animal Pals may seem all fun and games - because it is. What isn’t too obvious is just how educational and beneficial it can be for your child to play Animal Pals, matching games can actually develop and improve visual and concentration skills. So whilst they are having fun, you can also be sure that they are gaining vital skills that will aid them in later life. Aside from this, the game is simply the classic game of matching - yet with more color, variety and life than ever! To play, the user must tap two cards which will need to match for them to count. They must remember where each one is and tap it whenever they find the pair! There are 30 fun animals for them to discover, each one more interesting than the last! Also, Animal Pals has 3 themes with 3 modes of difficulty for those expert matchers! Enter the Ocean, Farm or Jungle in a race against time! Bonus points are scored when multiple matches are made in a row! It’s child-friendly as there are no links to social networks, no in-app purchases, no 3rd party advertising and Animal Pals does not collect personal data. You can have the peace of mind knowing that your little one is playing a child-friendly application and learning whilst doing so. Match the animals and have fun - in Animal Pals! ★★★★★ App Features ★★★★★ ✔ 30 animals to match and discover! ✔ Tap to flip a card! ✔ Three themes to use: Ocean, Farm and Jungle! ✔ Play together or have your child play and learn independently! ✔ Stunning Retina graphics! ✔ Child-friendly! This app... - Does not contain links to social networks - Does not collect user data - Does not contain 3rd party advertising

*****THIS IS A DONATE VERSION***** The App currently has ever-changing functionality! It'll change as I work on different devices... The main goal is to help fund purchase of future wearable devices so I can continue to expand the reach of Zooper Wear! Moving forward, "Zooper Wear - Donate Edition" will become a platform for me to test all versions! For example, one week I might be using it to test the circular version, the next week it'll be used to test the Pine version...the next week it'll be used to test updates to existing versions, you never know, hehe Thanks for the continued support & hopefully I'll be able to continue to bring Zooper Wear to more & more wearable devices!

description: *****THIS IS NOT A STANDALONE APP***** FEATURES > Notification icons for SMS/GMail/Calls & more! > Time/Date > Wi-Fi/Mobile Data indicators¹ > Weather/Temperature > Phone Battery percentage/Charging indicator¹ > Upcoming Calendar Events > Dark/Light themes ¹ = Change dynamically depending on whether or not they're in-use REQUIREMENTS: > ROOT'ed Omate TrueSmart > Omate TrueSmart watch with the ability to sideload the Play Store > Zooper Pro-> http://tinyurl.com/ZooperWidgetPro > Tasker Pro ( for Notifications )-> http://tinyurl.com/TaskerPro > 3rd-party Launcher ( example: Nova ) Setup: 1) Install 3rd-party Launcher ( recommended - "Nova Launcher" ) 2) Install Zooper Pro & Tasker 3) Follow the Launcher & Zooper setup below 4) Install Zooper Wear - Omate Edition 5) Create a 4X4 Zooper Widget on your Homescreen 6) Within the Zooper Widget setup, select any of the templates 7) Still within Zooper, change the scale according to the "preview" image of the Template selected 8) Follow the Tasker setup-> http://tinyurl.com/ZooperWearOmate-TaskerSetup That's it! Return to your Homescreen & Zooper Wear - Omate should now be present *Nova Settings* : Desktop > Desktop Grid-> 4X4 > Width Margin-> None > Height Margin-> None > Persistent Search Bar-> None > Scroll Indicator-> None Dock > Enable Dock-> Disabled > Show Divider-> Disabled Look & Feel > Screen Orientation-> Force Landscape > Show Notification Bar-> Disabled > Transparent Notification Bar-> Disabled *Zooper Widget Pro Settings* : > Global Preferences > Weather Provider-> Yahoo! > Landscape Mode (beta)-> Enabled > Alternative Geocoder-> Enabled > Standby Updates-> Enabled Choosing a Watch Face Each design has 2 icons on its preview image which indicates what additional features it supports. > If you don't want Calendar Events to appear, select one with a red "X" on the image Calendar image > If you do want Calendar Events to appear, select one with a green "Checkmark" on the Calendar image same applies for whether you do or don't want to use Tasker integration Reminders - App has no App icon itself - If you can't get it working, EMail me & I'll be happy to help WARNINGS - Designed primarily for use with an Omate TrueSmart in "standalone" mode ( with a SIM inside it ), though can be used without, as long as it has a Data connection - This Widget is made for use on an Omate TrueSmart Watch & will not look right if installed on a phone. ===== ===== ===== ===== QUESTIONS - Can I assign a different App to launch when tapping SMS/Phone? Answers to those & more FAQ's : http://tinyurl.com/ZooperWear-Omate-FAQ

Keep track of the US terrorism alert level with this home screen widget. Terror Alert Widget provides an at-a-glance update of the current terrorism threat. This widget syncs directly with the Department of Homeland Security National Terrorism Advisory System (NTAS). Optimized to use very little system resources. Users on limited data plans can customize how often the widget updates. From the DHS.gov website: The National Terrorism Advisory System, or NTAS, replaces the color-coded Homeland Security Advisory System (HSAS). This system will more effectively communicate information about terrorist threats by providing timely, detailed information to the public, government agencies, first responders, airports and other transportation hubs, and the private sector. It recognizes that Americans all share responsibility for the nation's security, and should always be aware of the heightened risk of terrorist attack in the United States and what they should do. Terror Alert Widget is not directly affiliated with National Terrorism Advisory System or the Department of Homeland Security, however Terror Alert Widget gets its data directly from the dhs.gov server.
release_text: Made the full version free! Enjoy, and be safe.

description: This is the official IIFYM macro calculator as found on IIFYM.com This APP has 7 diet and fitness calculators to help you and your clients navigate through macro dieting and IIFYM. All you have to do is enter your details, select your goals and retrieve your macros. We make it easy, fun and fool proof!

See the current time and date with this cool live wallpaper - in true 3D. Navigate between home screens to interact with this wallpaper or pinch to zoom in and out. Watch the text rotate and the background move from side to side. Customize both date and background. Choose between 12 or 24 hour time format. Apply any color to the text and background. Or select one of the textures for text, or change the background image with one that you like from the library, or use your own. This wallpaper is true 3D and uses OpenGl 2.0. While featuring smooth animations, it was built to conserve battery life. It uses zero battery when not interacting with it. Background images by paul bica, Pedro Szekely (szeke) and nosha. Problems? Visit our Facebook page or email me with the model of your phone and a description of the problem.

description: HIFI NEVER WENT AWAY, IT JUST NEVER WENT WIRELESS. UNTIL NOW. The Bluesound Controller App is designed to be the full-featured remote control for all Bluesound Players. Available for Android tablets and phones, the Bluesound Controller App uses your home WiFi network to connect with Bluesound Players and play all the music you love anywhere in the home for a wireless multi-room music experience like no other. Get on-demand access to your music libraries on your home network, stream live Internet radio from any place in the world, or listen to one of the many music services available on Bluesound, all from the palm of your hand with the easy-to-use Bluesound Controller App. It’s everything your Bluesound Player has to offer at your fingertips. Bluesound’s expanding collection of digital music services includes: Deezer®, HDtracks®, Highresaudio®, JUKE®, Murfie®, Qobuz®, Rdio®, Rhapsody®, Slacker Radio®, Spotify®, TIDAL®, TuneIn® and WiMP®. About Bluesound: An alliance of audiophiles. We are the designers, engineers and passionate music lovers who have spent our lives in the music industry. Our founders pioneered HiFi in the 70s - innovation and the pursuit of perfection in audio runs deep in our collective DNA. Bluesound’s sole mission is to create innovative wireless digital audio products and technologies that allow for the most true-to-life music experience possible. It is the first wireless digital multi-room system to fully support High Res Audio with an extraordinary audiophile-grade feature-set that all music lovers will appreciate. Bluesound is not just another computer company. Bluesound is all about sound..

This app utilizes the camera to recognize Chess Diagrams in books using optical character recognition (OCR). It saves each recognized diagram in a pgn file, and also puts the most recent one in the clipboard as a FEN string. You can then invoke a chess program like DroidFish, or SCIDOnthego directly to analyze the position or do a data base search for games that contain this position. For best results the diagram should take up at least half the camera view, and the book be reasonably flat (there is some compensation for page warp). It works best for cameras that have autofocus capabilities, and will not work as well on cameras that can not autofocus. Also, some cameras are not very sensitive to light and require bright background lighting, while others work well even in low lighting conditions. If the chess diagrams are not being recognized, then try setting the video resolution higher than the default (say to 1280 x 720) and/or setting the ISO to a high value instead of leaving it on auto. Also remember to keep the page as flat as possible in reasonably bright light. A green box will appear around the diagram after one successful recognition. By default two identical recognition of the same diagram in a sequence are necessary (this can be changed in settings) for a final successful result. If you are only recognizing diagrams from modern books then you can usually set the double recognition flag to false. Before you try this app on your chess books you should take any pdf file from http://www.qualitychess.co.uk/pdf.htm and print out a single page, and then try recognition of the diagram with ChessOcr. Recognition of the diagrams in these pdf files also works when they are displayed on a computer screen, but is not as reliable. If your device does not have autofocus then the app will likely not work well enough to satisfy you, but on devices with autofocus it works well on modern books. However, recognition is not as reliable for books with older fonts, or poorly printed diagrams. You can also use a free database that I maintain to look up the games associated with a given recognized position as follows: 1) Install ChessOcr app and SCIDOntheGo https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.scid.android 2) Download zip file http://www.kgrothapps.com/files/dbmsall-aug-9-14.zip then unzip and put these files in SCID directory. 3) Start SCIDOntheGo app and do file open database dbmsall-aug-9-14.zip, and keep this database open. 4) Long press on the board, go to bottom of menu, and select "Retrieve position". 5) First time set selection of ChessOcr to be the permanent association. 6) Place diagram in middle of video, large as possible and press screen to start. 7) Recognized position is drawn on screen, press which colour is to move. 8) Resulting position is returned to SCIDOntheGO 9) Do "Search, Search current board, Ok" and then pgn for matching games will be retrieved. You can use "Retrieve position" from the chess app DroidFish by doing long press on the board, going to the bottom of the menu, and then selecting "Retrieve Position".
release_text: Release 1.13 adds the capability to save to a previously used pgn file and shows the current pgn file in the action bar. Release 1.11 fixes some auto focus problems on various devices. Release 1.10 increases the default screen resolution, and has some bug fixes. Release 1.9 fixes a problem on some Samsung devices. Release 1.8 draws a green box around the recognized figure in the default double recognition mode.

description: Why "Check in" to a location when you can Pillage? Introducing, MyndQuest! The new GPS, GeoLocation-based checkin app! It's a virtual scavenger hunt! - Strongly influenced by the app formerly known as Gowalla, you can: - Found new Spots and Locations - Check in (or Pillage and Defend) - Unlock location-based GeoQuests (States/Provinces/Countries) - Get random items, drop them, swap them at other locations, or just collect them. You might find a glass of wine or maybe an Escaped Convict! You might even find Corruption! Either way, it's yours to keep or trade. - Defend against other users who will pillage your locatons and may take control of them. - Look out for disruptive barbarians (a random computer element) who are out to capture your spots! - Every time that you travel to a new country, state, province, etc, you will earn a GeoQuest badge! So get out and explore! - Ability to upload user profile pictures and add friends! See where your friends go and what items they have collected! - MyndQuest is ultimately a social app; with some Geolocation gaming elements. - Push Notifications to notify you of friend activity and pillaging warnings **** THIS APP REQUIRES GPS AND/OR LOCATION SERVICES TO BE ON DISCLAIMER: Since this is very new, there is a large chance you will be the only one in the area with it installed. Therefore, it is up to YOU to begin creating spots and map out the world. this app requires a minimum of two local users before you see the benefits! So get a friend going on it too! This app uses both Miles and Kilometers based on user settings. Requires a FREE user account to access. Simply enter a username/password/email and you're set up! Requires Android 4.1+ PERMISSIONS: many of the permissions in this app are required to access your Google+ account information but ONLY if you choose to log in and give permission once inside the app. We also use Google Cloud Messaging which requires several permissions to send status bar push notifications between users. Lastly, we need the GPS and internet permission, because, honestly, without the internet and your location, this would not be an app. Developed by KickingLettuce Studios; the app is currently ad-free.

description: The Opinion App! MyndCast is the premier social venue for rating, reviewing, and sharing the things we love. It's inspired by some of our favorite elements from apps and social networks you know already. MyndCast lets you: - Create a custom profile and track your stats - Become a fan and follow your friends or other users - Rate and review thousands of items - Add new items to the community - Comment and Up vote reviews you love - Share your reviews across all social media - And... Get rewards for ALL of it! Every action in MyndCast is worth points, so you can see your profile and stats rank up as you rate, review, and acquire fans that love your thoughts. They say everybody's a critic, and we all want to share the things we like with our friends, but who has the time to write reviews on everything they love? With MyndCast, now you can! Served up in shots of 200 characters or less, concise micro-reviews are a blast of opinion that makes it easy to share what's on your mind. In seconds, a Micro Review can be written, posted, or shared. Additionally, an informative meta score or aggregate public opinion can be seen for every item in MyndCast. With just a glance you can tell instantly how the world feels about: Movies TV Music (Artists) Video Games Beer Celebrities Cocktails Companies Food Restaurants Whisky (Scotch Whiskey, Bourbon, etc) and More! With Wikipedia connected to every item it's now easier than ever to explore and discover more about..well everything. MyndCast: 'What's on your mind?' ********************************************** - Check out our web home at http://www.myndcast.net where you can add and view your profile! - Now available for iOS as well! ********************************************** This is a free, new community and requires a basic user login and password. We value user content so please consider signing up and joining in on the discussions! Optimized for tablets (10" or 7") This app has been Inspired by Twitter, Foursquare and the now defunct Blippr. This app is ad-supported. PRIVACY POLICY IS INSIDE APPLICATION.

description: 「放開那三國」六大必玩理由： 精 - 遊戲品質精益求精，打造最讃的三國卡牌手遊。 彩 - 遊戲色彩清新唯美，頂尖畫師詮釋最炫三國風。 不 - 遊戲不要不開心，呆萌劇情讓你全場樂不停。 容 - 遊戲問題零容忍，金牌服務讓您沒有後顧之憂。 錯 - 百萬玩家推薦，這遊戲真不錯。 過 - 定期版本更新，精彩不容錯過。 【新手必看】 「體力值」- 打普通副本、精英副本、活動副本消耗，隨時間慢慢恢復。 「耐力值」- 參加奪寶、競技場、比武活動需要，隨時間慢慢恢復。 「銀幣」- 用於裝備強化、武將進化、天命升級等，通過副本、占星台，奪寶等獲得。 「金幣」- 招募武將、購買商城道具等需要，通過儲值、等級禮包、開服禮包等方式獲得。 「主角卡」- 天命系統中通過消耗星星和銀幣點亮星宿，可進化成紫卡。 【特色系統】 「怒氣系統」武將怒氣值大於等於4點，便會發動特有的必殺技能。 「羈絆系統」特定武將同時上場，可激發潛在能力提高戰鬥力。 「占星系統」獲得項鍊的最主要途徑，還可兌換大量獎勵。 「名將系統」送禮物增加好感度，提高全體武將的能力。 「比武系統」玩家PK的平臺，週六23點發放海量銀幣、金幣和關羽武魂。 【玩家情報】 ※有進階丹的時候請第一時間升級主角，因為那是性價比最高的。 ※當你推圖過不了的時候，請改變一下陣容，或許有意向不到的效果 ※有羈絆的武將永遠比裸將有用，哪怕有羈絆的只是個藍將。 ※奶不是必要的，但是沒有奶有時候會讓你寸步難行。 ※一群+2的武將上陣永遠比一個+5的武將上陣更有威力。 ※上陣武將中應該有2個武將有控制技能（暈，減怒，封印等）。 ※使用招募令請先存夠50個。 ※每天貢獻軍團20金幣是只賺不賠的。 ※加50個好友保證每天都能領完30點耐力。 ※金幣怎麼花？首抽加兩次10連抽保證陣容全紫將，其餘可以用來買箱子+鑰匙。 【推薦陣容】 「全能小分隊」主角、張飛、馬超、曹仁、太史慈、華佗。 張飛：減怒技能，能打能控。 馬超：強力的單體爆發能力，讓對手措不及防。 曹仁：三國第一肉盾，與馬超還有羈絆。 太史慈：攻擊敵人的後排，與馬超依然有羈絆。 華佗：第一奶媽，畢竟活著才有攻擊力。 幽默的劇情，搞怪的對白！新派卡牌，讓我先來！ 調遣大喬小喬貂蟬孫尚香，組一支三國太太團，譜寫屬於你的那三國。 放開那臉書： https://www.facebook.com/fun.kimi.com.tw 放開那哈拉區： http://forum.gamer.com.tw/A.php?bsn=25961 放開那官網： http://fun.kimi.com.tw 放開那客服： fun@kimi.com.tw ♦依遊戲軟體分級管理辦法本遊戲分類為：輔導十二歲級 ♦遊戲涉及暴力、部份角色有凸顯胸、臀之服飾 ♦請注意使用時間，避免沉迷遊戲 ♦本遊戲部分內容需要購買遊戲幣消費
release_text: 1、新增橙裝鑄造系統。紫裝可鑄造成橙裝。 2、新增新的天命格，主角開放第二次進化。 3、新增尋龍探寶功能，可獲得大量橙裝鑄造材料。 4、新增一批新的武將，可以遊戲競技場商店、軍團商店等系統兌換獲得。

description: There are plenty of tools available to consumers to see how much money can be borrowed. This is what the lending institutions want you to see. They want you to borrow more money so they can collect more interest. There are also plenty of debt management tools available. These tools typically focus on understanding how much you have already paid, how much remains, and when you can expect to pay off the debt. Debt Killer is designed for those who want to be more aggressive. It will help you understand the cost of debt and encourage EARLY pay-off. This means less money to the lending institution and more money for you. Lending institutions normally don't have these types of calculators for you because they are perfectly happy to let you pay the full interest amount. They've shaped how the public views debt and helped make it the norm to be content with paying the minimum amount each month (which translates into maximum profit for the loaning institution). If this is unsettling to you and you want to kill you debt, this app is for you. The question that this tool helps to answer is, "how much do I save if I pay X amount extra towards the principal each month?" Then, if you want to try different amounts, you can use the sliding bar to see how much you can save in real-time without having to enter new numbers. Using the bar, you should be able to see that the initial extra amounts that you pay towards the principal have the largest impact! All numbers on the output are estimates, your loan and credit issuing agencies may have different calculation methods to compound interest. The Loan and Refinance calculators are based on monthly interest compounding but can still be used to approximate values for bi-monthly or daily interest compounding. The Credit Card calculator assumes that the current interest rate is the average interest rate and the interest is compounded daily.
release_text: Version 4 updates: - disabled landscape layout, now works correctly with higher DPI screens

description: A tri dimensional game based on classical model of flipping two cards and memorizing the images drawn on the cards. When cards contain different images, they will return to the initial state. When cards contain identical images, they stay open. The goal is to find all couples of identical images. The success depends on short term visual memory and good concentration. Rotations of the object makes the mission more difficult to complete, requires to remember not only the position of the card on table, but also on which side of the cube (or other object) the card was placed. Look for two identical photos on sides of cube or other 3D object. We provide pictures of 100 animals to play with. Photos are randomly selected and placed on sides of a cube or pyramid or Cube³. Player need to find all pairs of images to complete the level. There are two modes of difficulty: Easy (default) mode – photos are placed on 4 sides of a cube or on 3 sides of a pyramid, object can be rotated only horizontally (over Y axis) by sliding left<->right; Hard mode – photos are placed on all 6 sides of a cube or on 4 sides of a pyramid, object can be rotated horizontally or vertically (over Y and X axis) by sliding left<->right or up<->down; In order to change the mode or turn sound off/on tap on standard menu button. Also, there are four levels of difficulty: 1x1, 2x2 ,3x3, 4x4 photos on side, game starts from level1 and goes to the next level, only if the level is completed good enough (less clicks - better score). This app is completely free, thanks to advertising networks used: Admob - it will help us to keep developing more apps.

description: Have you ever seen those strange markings in Futurama and wondered what they meant? Your solution is right here. The language is called Alienese and the show's creators have hidden many clever jokes throughout the show. Here's a hint for your first one, just watch the opening credits near "Bachelor Chow"

description: This remake of old-school classic javelin throwing game "Javelin 2000" includes global high score lists for real javelin masters! Compete against other players on longest throws and best competition (average of three throws) results! Now with global monthly competition! I'll post the competition results below on a monthly basis. ★ Pixel graphics and 8-bit game music for real retro look and feel; just like it just to be with legendary track & field sport games. ★ Simple controls to set the angle, run and throw needs no more than just tapping and pressing the screen exactly at the right time for longest possible throw. The changing wind also affects the javelin's trajectory. ★ Your personal coach will give you valuable instructions to help you to become the true javelin throwing champion. The original game was made in late 1990's and has gained a cult reputation among oldschool DOS sports and retro game fans. This remake respects the original game by utilizing mostly the original artwork and has the same overall look & feel as it's ancestor. No transparency! No anti-aliasing! No interpolation! Only the best hand-picked fully opaque pixels carefully placed at right screen positions form together this magnificent javelin experience! Just like in the original game, the super-realistic physics are based on extraordinary complex scientific calculations and formulas :) On March 2015 Juha still kept his strong position with a zillion successful throws. And here are the awesome results: 1: JUHA 96,79 Finland 2: JUHA 96,69 Finland 3: JUHA 96,60 Finland The February 2015 monthly competition results are listed below. Juha clearly continues to dominate the list. 1: JUHA 97,33 Finland 2: JUHA 96,83 Finland 3: JUHA 96,41 Finland Juha from Finland dominated the montly competition on January 2015. Congrats! Does anyone dare to challange this Javelin champion on Feb? The competition is on! 1: JUHA 94,94 Finland 2: JUHA 94,94 Finland 3: JUHA 94,79 Finland December 2014 top-3 results: 1: JAY 90,70 New Zealand 2: LASU 90,68 Australia 3: JAY 88,39 New Zealand

description: SanaPelissä on tarkoitus löytää mahdollisimman monta eri sanaa kirjainruudukosta aikarajan sisällä. Sanan löydyttyä vastaavat ruudukon kirjaimet korvataan uusilla kirjaimilla, joten ruudukko muuttuu pelin edetessä. Ruudukon voi myös kierrättää, jollei sanoja tunnu löytyvän. SanaPelissä on myös vapaa tila, jossa voi etsiä sanoja kolmesta erikokoisesta ruudukosta ilman aikarajaa. Tilanne tallennetaan automaattisesti, joten keskenjäänyttä sanapeliä voi jatkaa myöhemmin. Voit pelata sanapeliä ja etsiä sanoja matkapuhelimella tai tabletilla missä ja milloin tahansa! ★ Täysin suomenkielinen sanapeli ★ Aikaraja ja vapaa pelitila ★ Ilmaisia päivittäisiä vihjeitä ★ Sanojen etsiminen helpolla pyyhkäisyeleellä Suosittu sanapeli myös ruotsin- ja englanninkielisinä versioina! Katso kiollilan "OrdSpel" ja "WordGame" Google Play kaupassa. Looking for English version? Check out 'WordGame' by kiollila. Word of the game is to find as many different words kirjainruudukosta within the time limit. Word has been found, the corresponding letters on the grid are replaced with new characters, so the grid will change as the game progresses. The grid can also be recycled, unless the words seems to be. The word game also has a free space where you can look up words in a grid of three different sizes, without any time limit. The situation is saved automatically, so unfinished word game can continue later. You can play the word game and look for the words of a mobile phone or tablet anytime, anywhere! ★ Fully Finnish word game ★ Time limit and free game mode ★ Free daily tips ★ Searching for words in an easy scanning means The popular word game including the Swedish and English versions! See kiollilan "OrdSpel" and "Word Game" from the Google Play store. Looking for English version? Check out the 'Word Game' by kiollila.

description: She is the prettiest creature in the world! Just imagine that you have your own doll, which you’ll dress up and care for as baby! Isn’t it amazing? Now with Dress Up Coco – Fashion doll app all your dreams will come true! You’ll make your doll baby beautiful, change her dresses and dress her up as a princess! Download this app and let yourself and your doll baby live in the world of fashion. Change dresses, pants, tights, skirts, summer sunglasses from popular fashion houses! Help your baby doll get fashion dresses and make her a princess! You can choose summer or winter clothes, anyway your baby will look like a princess! You’ll have beautiful princess and you can do the complete makeover for her – dress her up, choose popular fashion dresses and accessories, change her hairstyle from Mohawk to mere headbands, do makeup and change design of her dress! So convert your cute but casual doll into princess! Don’t hurry to make a conclusion that it’s only for kids – the app can be interesting for adults also! • Dress Up Coco – Fashion doll app is absolutely free, download it now and enjoy being a stylist! • Internet is required only for downloading! • Regular updates ensure app has the latest version of the Dress Up Coco – Fashion doll game! App is made for people who like creating new and beautiful designs. So don’t think in that it’s only for kids. If you have sense of beauty, this app is exactly what you need! Your adorable Coco is the most popular one among all dolls – the whole shopping mall is in her disposal – she can choose without retention any summer or winter dress, as sweater, summer sunglasses, headbands, tights and cosmetics, as flair, eyeliner of hazel color and others. And of course such popular stylist as you will do for her any hairstyle without any retention, even Mohawk! You can convert her in a Tinkerbell, Bloom from Winx, bride at wedding, who’s walking down the aisle to her fiancé in hazel tuxedo. She can be star with tiara on the cover of Claire magazine or can get Oscar and it’s just a matter of your taste! Isn’t it adorable? You can select for her the eyeshadow, lipstick, eyeliner, flair, tiara etc. You can change color of her hair on hazel and etc. Take care of your doll as her mommy or babysitter – after makeover select clothes of holiday or casual style, as sweater and etc. Forget about playing with dolls, hopscotch and Malibu games – this yoko game will give you chance to care about a girl, like real mommy or babysitter! Follow us on Facebook/ Dress Up Coco – Fashion
